    public class SimplePageRankVertex
extends org.apache.giraph.graph.Vertex<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.FloatWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable>
    Demonstrates the basic Pregel PageRank implementation.
